item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆称进一步降息空间有限
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆周一表示，他支持在上周的联储会议上降息，作为保护就业市场的预防措施，但他表示，鉴于通胀率高于联储2%的目标，进一步降息的空间可能 "有限"。【原文：St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said on Monday he supported the rate cut at last week's Fed meeting as a precautionary move to protect the job market, but said there may be "limited room" for further reductions given inflation above the Fed's 2% target.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在西方被冻结的资产有哪些？
item.description: 2022 年俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰后，美国及其盟国禁止与俄罗斯中央银行和财政部进行交易，自此欧盟冻结了价值高达 2500 亿美元的俄罗斯资产。【原文：As much as $250 billion worth of Russian assets have been frozen in the European Union since the U.S. and its allies prohibited transactions with Russia's central bank and finance ministry following Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.】

item.title: 巴西 Cosan 公司表示，增资 100 亿美元是为了减轻债务，而不是为 Raizen 公司提供资金
item.description: 巴西企业集团 Cosan 的一位高管周一表示，该公司计划通过公开募股筹集 100 亿雷亚尔（约合 19 亿美元）的资金，但这些资金将仅用于减轻公司债务，并补充说，这些资金将不会用于帮助其陷入困境的与石油巨头壳牌的合资企业。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate Cosan's plans to raise up to 10 billion reais ($1.9 billion) through public offerings will go only to alleviating the company's debt, a top executive said on Monday, adding none of the funds would go to helping its embattled joint venture with oil giant Shell .】

item.title: 罗氏首席执行官和制药公司高管将就美国关税问题与瑞士政府会晤
item.description: 罗氏公司首席执行官托马斯-希内克尔（Thomas Schinecker）和瑞士制药业的其他高管将于周一与政府会面，讨论美国关税对这一重要出口行业构成的威胁。【原文：Roche Chief Executive Thomas Schinecker and other senior executives from the Swiss pharmaceuticals industry will meet with the government on Monday to discuss the threat U.S. tariffs pose to the crucial export sector.】

item.title: 禽流感爆发后欧盟将重新开放巴西鸡肉市场
item.description: 巴西农业部周一发表声明说，欧盟将重新向巴西鸡肉开放市场，解除 5 月份在南里奥格兰德州爆发禽流感后实施的禁令。【原文：The European Union will reopen its market to Brazil's chicken meat, lifting a ban imposed in May after a bird flu outbreak in Rio Grande do Sul state, Brazil's agriculture ministry said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 英国石油公司放弃鹿特丹生物燃料工厂建设计划
item.description: 英国石油公司发言人周一表示，该公司已停止鹿特丹生物燃料工厂的工作，这是英国石油公司（BP）和壳牌石油公司（Shell）等石油公司在需求疲软的情况下放弃生物燃料项目的最新案例。【原文：BP has stopped work on its Rotterdam biofuels plant, a company spokesperson said on Monday, marking the latest in a string of abandoned biofuels projects by oil companies such as BP and Shell in the face of weak demand.】

item.title: 分析师观点 特朗普上调 H-1B 签证费，重点关注熟练技术劳动力的准入问题
item.description: 特朗普政府提议对科技公司广泛用于雇用外国人才的新 H-1B 签证征收 10 万美元的费用，这可能会对严重依赖印度和中国技术工人的该行业造成打击。【原文：The Trump administration's proposed $100,000 fee for new H-1B visas widely used by tech firms to hire foreign talent could deal a blow to the sector that relies heavily on skilled workers from India and China.】

item.title: Allwyn 收购梦幻体育运营商 PrizePicks 的多数股权，首付 16 亿美元
item.description: 博彩娱乐集团 Allwyn International 周一表示，该公司将以 16 亿美元的初始现金对价收购梦幻体育运营商 PrizePicks 约 62% 的股份。【原文：Gaming entertainment group Allwyn International will acquire an approximately 62% stake in fantasy sports operator PrizePicks for an initial cash consideration of $1.6 billion, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长：美国准备支持阿根廷，领导人将于周二会晤
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一表示，支持阿根廷的 "所有稳定方案都已摆在桌面上"，更多细节将在阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二会晤后公布。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday said "all options for stabilization are on the table" to support Argentina, with more details available after Argentine President Javier Milei and U.S. President Donald Trump meet on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美联储主席博斯蒂克认为今年不会进一步降息
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一发表的采访报道，亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，由于对通货膨胀的担忧，他目前认为今年没有必要进一步降息。【原文：Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said he does not currently see the need for further interest rate cuts this year due to inflation concerns, according to an interview published by the Wall Street Journal on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普的新签证政策引发科技公司的强烈反应
item.description: 技术高管和投资者表示，新收费可能会给公司增加数百万美元的成本，并对初创企业造成不成比例的伤害，因为这些企业可能无力负担签证费用，而签证是其战略的一部分。【原文：Technology executives and investors said the new fees could add millions of dollars in costs for companies and disproportionately hurt startups, which may not be able to afford visas as part of their strategy.】

item.title: Netflix 与百威英博签署联合营销协议，推广电视节目和啤酒
item.description: Netflix 和 Anheuser-Busch InBev 周一表示，双方已签署一项全球联合营销协议，以推广流媒体平台上收视率最高的节目和酿酒商的啤酒。【原文：Netflix and Anheuser-Busch InBev have signed a global co-marketing deal to promote the streaming platform's most-watched titles and the brewer's beers, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，SAP为消除欧盟反垄断担忧做出让步
item.description: 欧洲最大的软件制造商思爱普公司（SAP）已作出让步，以解决欧盟对其商业行为的反垄断关注，该公司直接了解此事的消息人士称，思爱普正在努力避免欧盟的调查和可能的罚款。【原文：SAP, Europe's largest software maker, has offered concessions to address EU antitrust concerns related to its business practices, sources with direct knowledge of the matter said, as it seeks to stave off an investigation and potential fine.】

item.title: 甲骨文出人意料地任命内部人士克雷-马古埃克和迈克-西西利亚为联席首席执行官
item.description: 甲骨文公司周一任命公司内部人士克雷-马古尔克（Clay Magouyrk）和迈克-西西利亚（Mike Sicilia）为联席首席执行官，接替在执掌公司 11 年后被任命为董事会副主席的萨夫拉-卡茨（Safra Catz）。【原文：Oracle on Monday named insiders Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia as co-CEOs, replacing Safra Catz who was named vice chair of the board after 11 years at the helm.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司获得拉美航空公司 24 架 E195-E2 喷气机的确定订单
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的 E195-E2 喷气式飞机将加入拉美航空（LATAM Airlines）的机队，这家总部位于智利的航空公司周一表示，已确定订购 24 架飞机，并有另外 50 架飞机的购买选择权。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's E195-E2 jet will join LATAM Airlines' fleet after the Chile-based carrier placed a firm order for 24 aircraft, with purchase options for another 50, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 经济学家称，瑞士央行将在 9 月 25 日和 2026 年全年维持零利率不变
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，大多数经济学家认为，由于通胀保持在目标水平，货币保持稳定，瑞士国家银行将在 9 月 25 日和 2026 年全年将政策利率维持在零水平。【原文：The Swiss National Bank will hold its policy rate at zero on September 25 and throughout 2026 due to inflation remaining on target and the currency holding steady, according to a majority of economists in a Reuters poll.】

item.title: 美国机构希望从力拓购买氧化钪用于国防储备
item.description: 美国国防部后勤局正寻求在未来五年内从矿业巨头力拓集团的一个部门购买价值高达 4000 万美元的氧化钪，以确保这种关键材料的供应，并将其纳入国家储备。【原文：The U.S. Defense Logistics Agency is seeking to buy scandium oxide worth up to $40 million over the next five years from a unit of mining giant Rio Tinto to secure supplies of the critical material for addition to the national stockpile.】

item.title: 洪水保险供应商海王星在美国首次公开募股中的目标估值为 28 亿美元
item.description: 海王保险公司周一表示，随着首次公开募股市场持续火热，该公司在美国首次公开募股的目标估值将高达 27.6 亿美元。【原文：Neptune Insurance said on Monday it was targeting a valuation of up to $2.76 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, as the IPO market continues to run hot.】

item.title: T-Mobile 任命 Srini Gopalan 为首席执行官
item.description: T-Mobile 周一表示，现任首席运营官斯里尼-戈帕兰（Srini Gopalan）将从 11 月 1 日起接替迈克-希沃特（Mike Sievert），出任公司下一任首席执行官。【原文：T-Mobile's current chief operating officer, Srini Gopalan, will take over from Mike Sievert as the company's next CEO effective November 1, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 埃尼公司与美国联邦核聚变公司达成超过 10 亿美元的电力交易
item.description: 意大利能源公司埃尼（Eni）周一表示，它与联邦聚变系统公司（Commonwealth Fusion System）在弗吉尼亚州的项目达成了一项超过 10 亿美元的购电协议。【原文：Italian energy company Eni said on Monday it struck a more than $1 billion power purchase with Commonwealth Fusion System's project in Virginia that the companies hope by the early 2030s will generate electricity through the reaction that fires the sun.】

item.title: 辉瑞将以高达 49 亿美元的价格收购减肥药开发商 Metsera
item.description: 辉瑞公司周一表示，将以高达 49 亿美元的价格收购减肥药开发商 Metsera，以确保其在利润丰厚的肥胖症治疗市场的地位。【原文：Pfizer said on Monday it would acquire weight-loss drug developer Metsera for up to $4.9 billion to secure its position in the lucrative obesity treatment market.】

item.title: 独家报道贝索斯支持的可再生能源联盟目标是为发展中国家提供 75 亿美元资金
item.description: 一个在发展中国家安装可再生能源设备的联盟希望在下一个五年计划中投资约 75 亿美元，该联盟的高管告诉路透社，由于富裕国家削减了政府援助，该联盟正在寻求更多的慈善合作伙伴。【原文：An alliance that installs renewable energy in developing countries wants to invest around $7.5 billion during its next five-year plan, executives told Reuters, and is seeking more philanthropic partners as richer nations cut government aid.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，中国要求经纪商暂停在香港的真实资产业务
item.description: 两位消息人士称，中国证券监督管理局已建议一些本地券商暂停在香港开展真实资产（RWA）代币化业务，这表明中国政府对离岸数字资产市场蓬勃发展的担忧。【原文：China's securities watchdog has advised some local brokerages to pause their real-world asset (RWA) tokenisation business in Hong Kong, said two sources, signalling Beijing's concerns of a euphoric drive towards a booming digital assets market offshore.】

item.title: 英国金融科技初创企业 Tide 融资 1.2 亿美元，加入独角兽俱乐部
item.description: 英国数字银行服务初创公司 Tide 周一表示，该公司以 15 亿美元的估值融资 1.2 亿美元，跻身英国金融科技 "独角兽 "行列。【原文：British digital banking services startup Tide has raised $120 million at a valuation of $1.5 billion, it said on Monday, joining the list of fintech "unicorns" in the UK.】

item.title: 对冲基金涌入银行、保险和消费金融领域，高盛集团称
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）在一份研究报告中称，对冲基金上周以三个月来最快的速度买入了银行、保险和消费金融公司，因为交易增加有望提高利润，而且监管有望进一步放松。【原文：Hedge funds bought banks, insurance and consumer finance companies last week at the fastest pace in three months, Goldman Sachs said in a research note, amid increased dealmaking expected to boost profits and an expected further loosening of regulations.】

item.title: 早间竞标高昂的代价
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，特朗普有望在本周晚些时候通过行政命令批准 TikTok 交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将在本周晚些时候通过行政命令批准短视频应用 TikTok 的交易，宣布该交易符合法律要求。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to approve a deal for short video app TikTok through an executive order, declaring that it satisfies the requirements of law later this week, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 美国期货在反弹后走低；市场等待特朗普签证政策的明朗化
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货走低，此前华尔街主要股指在上一交易日创下历史新高，而唐纳德-特朗普总统签证政策的不确定性也令市场情绪黯淡。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched lower on Monday after Wall Street's main indexes rallied to record highs in the previous session, while uncertainty around President Donald Trump's visa policies also dimmed sentiment.】

item.title: 美国法院权衡特朗普对罗德岛海上风电项目的禁令
item.description: 一名联邦法官周一将考虑丹麦海上风电开发商 Orsted 提出的重启已接近完工的 Revolution Wind 项目的请求。【原文：A federal judge on Monday will consider a request by Danish offshore wind developer Orsted to restart work on the nearly finished Revolution Wind project, which President Donald Trump's administration halted last month.】

item.title: 在化石燃料和核能复兴的背景下，Vistra 首席执行官伯克有望获得 3.4 亿美元的报酬
item.description: Vistra 首席执行官詹姆斯-伯克（James Burke）帮助这家总部位于得克萨斯州的公用事业公司从近十年前的破产灰烬中崛起，成为美国最炙手可热的电力生产商，并因此获得约 3.4 亿美元的收入。【原文：Vistra CEO James Burke stands to receive about $340 million for helping lift the Texas-based utility from the ashes of bankruptcy nearly a decade ago to become the hottest power producer in the United States.】
